H

huffman_code(BTNode<Integer, String>) - Static method in class p2.HuffmanCoding
Method that traverses the Huffman Tree and generates the prefix codes for each character using the huffmanHelper auxiliary method.
huffman_tree(Map<String, Integer>) - Static method in class p2.HuffmanCoding
Method that creates a sorted linked list of BTNodes from the frequency distribution map passsed as parameter, and then constructs the Huffman Tree from the sorted list.
HuffmanCoding - Class in p2
The Huffman Encoding Algorithm This is a data compression algorithm designed by David A.
HuffmanCoding() - Constructor for class p2.HuffmanCoding
 
huffmanHelper(BTNode<Integer, String>, Map<String, String>, String) - Static method in class p2.HuffmanCoding
Auxiliary Method that recursively adds the corresponding elements to the huffman tree.
